Science.headline: Millions of Americans are projected to face coastal flooding by 2100
Science.summary: Projections indicate that millions of Americans will likely face coastal flooding by the year 2100 due to rising sea levels and climate change. This forecast highlights a significant environmental challenge and potential displacement for coastal communities.
key_points: Millions of Americans face coastal flooding by 2100.
Due to rising sea levels and climate change.
Highlights significant environmental challenge.

Science.headline: “A lot of human waste”: British biologist’s simple test exposes shocking Ganga contamination

key_points: British biologist exposed Ganga contamination.

Offers new hope for cardiac repair.
